question: Mufti saab, I have asked this question a week ago and requested you to give the answer within a week, as my friend really needs this for his project that his huzur gave
answer:
QUESTION

Assalaamu 'Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu,

 

Mufti saab, I have asked this question a week ago and requested you to give the answer within a week, as my friend really needs this for his project that his huzur gave him. He needs to hand in his project on Wednesday. So, Mufti saab, I know that you get a lot of e-mails with many questions, but, would you please give the answer by tomorrow (Tuesday)?

What are the names of all the ambiya (as many as we know), what is the right order of them being sent (like, the 1st, the second, the 3rd, etc. in its right order), and in what ear each of them were sent? Please also include any additional information if needed for the betterment of the project.

 

Please Mufti saab answer this question as soon as tomorrow (Tuesday).

 

Jazakallah khairan wassalaamu 'alaikum.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

We appologize that we were unable to fulfil your request in time because of the immense volume of Questions we receive and the nature of your request. It is already Fridat.


We advise you to approach a local Alim for help in the regard


 

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best



Wassalamu Alaykum



Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa, Madrassah In'aamiyyah
